author: gdaniels
msg: Some changes (bug fixes and enhancements) spurred by the
WS-Eventing interop work.
* Enable getting a Duration as a Calendar (returns duration
plus a given starting Calendar value, which defaults to
now)
* Change ElementSerializer to have an option to just write
the raw Element instead of the wrapper element.  This
is controlled by the parameter "writeWrapperForElements".
* Fix bug syncing WSDD operations to Java operations for
message style (don't check params).
* (re?)add MessagElement constructors from QName, and
other accessors for child elements by QName.
* SOAPBodyElement / SOAPHeaderElement constructors from
QName
* Add PrefixedQName constructor to init from QName
* Add setter for "writeXMLType" in SerializationContext
* Fix bug sending back response with null response Message
in SimpleAxisWorker
* Fix missing class copy in JAX-RPC test build.xml
* Trim whitespace from non-String values in SimpleDeserializer
* Add "factory" scope (mechanism still getting final tweaks)
* Code cleanup

author: sanjaya
msg: changes for Axis C++ 1.1

msg: Fix typo.
